title: Os Maias
description: Os Maias: Episódios da Vida Romântica ("The Maias: Episodes of Romantic Life") is a realist novel by Portuguese author José Maria de Eça de Queiroz, also known under the modernized spelling Eça de Queirós. Maia is the name of a fictional family, although some episodes fit into the history of the real Maia family.
